casebody.data:
Chamberlain
v.
Bray 39P14-3 Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 18, 2016 Robert S. Chamberlain, for Chamberlain, Robert S. Kimberly N. Callahan, Assistant Attorney General, for State of North Carolina. The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 27th of June 2016 by Petitioner for Notice of Appeal: "Motion Dismissed as moot by order of the Court in conference, this the 18th of August 2016." Ervin, J. recused
